column2: an A.M. Eatery////The food was delightful and the service rocked!! My only turnoff was the coffee :( for a place that has such good food
column3: pairing it with brown water?? Come on guys!! There are so many local coffee roasters who can provide this place with great beans. Instead they have a bitter over roasted cup of brown water?? That's why I gave it 4 stars
